General.Name: Warom Technology Inc Co
General.Description: Warom Technology Incorporated Company manufactures and supplies explosion-proof electrical appliances and related products in China and internationally. It offers lighting technology products, such as fluorescent lamps, LED light fittings, pendant light fittings, floodlights, street and hand lamps, and spotlight fittings; and installation equipment, including installation switches, junction boxes, terminal boxes, and plugs and sockets. The company also provides control equipment comprising position switches, control stations and units, control buttons, indicators, control switches, and ammeters and voltmeters; load and motor switchgears; distribution boxes, components for distribution boxes, and explosion-proof and safety enclosures; and cable glands and bushings, such as bushings, connectors, seal bushings, cable glands, flexible conduits, and other accessories. In addition, it offers air conditioner and pressurized products, including window, air, and tank air conditioners, as well as distribution and engineering cabins, explosion-proof online monitoring analysis systems, and helicopter platforms; weatherproof products comprising weatherproof light fittings, office light fittings, streetlamps, plaza lights, weatherproof electrical appliances, and weatherproof pipe fittings; and marine products. The company products are used in oil and gas, chemical, pharmaceutical, food, offshore, mining, aerospace, coal, electric power, railway, metallurgy, marine, security, fire protection, irrigation, city planning, telecom, and diving rescue industries. Warom Technology Incorporated Company was founded in 1987 and is based in Shanghai, China.
